ZZZlist Radio The Place to find Underground Celebrities http://www.ZZZlist.com en-us Copyright 2009/2010 Sat, 05 Sep 2008 16:05:00 -0600 Sat, 05 Sep 2008 16:05:00 -0600 Ro Hurley and Chris Otto Podcast Alley feed! {pca-033a3a99f6a978fc4b3e53b2bb684cae}
Ro Hurley and Chris Otto ZZZlist Radio is a show discussing odd news and underground celebrities. Check us out for fun talk, celebrities, art, entertainment, and politics.
Ro Hurley editor@zzzlist.com
Yes

ZZZlist Radio - Episode 32: Interview with Thomas Riccio http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp032_TomRiccio_03072010.mp3 http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp032_TomRiccio_03072010.mp3 Ro and Chris are joined by Thomas Riccio, the man who recorded O.J. ZZZlist Radio - Episode 31: Special Reddit Video Interview with Goodfella Henry Hill http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp031_HenryHillReddit_080510.wmv http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp031_HenryHillReddit_080510.wmv In the first ever ZZZlist Video Podcast, Ro is joined by Henry Hill. Henry is best known as the character portrayed by Ray Liotta in Martin Scorsese's epic film "Goodfellas".
Check out Henry's ebay store at http://stores.ebay.com/HENRY-HILL-GOODFELLA-ARTWORK
For information on Silver City - Dallas' Premier Cabaret, visit: http://www.silvercityclub.com

ZZZlist Radio - Episode 30: Interview with Robert Romanus http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp030_RobertRomanus_050810.mp3 http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp030_RobertRomanus_050810.mp3 Ro is joined by actor/musician Robert Romanus, best known for his role as badass Mike Damone from Fast Times at Ridgemont High. During the interview, we discuss Robert's extensive career which includes Fast Times at Ridgemont High, Foxes, The Facts of Life, Mojave Phone Booth, The Runaways, and much more.
Check out his personal website http://www.robertromanus.com.
Intro "Poppa's Kitchen" by Poppa's Kitchen. Outro "Me and My Guitar" by Poppa's Kitchen.
Podcasts Sat, 08 May 2010 23:58:00 -0300

ZZZlist Radio - Episode 29: The Homeless Episode with Timmy and Mabel http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp029_TimmyMabel_021710.mp3 http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZlistRadioEp029_TimmyMabel_021710.mp3 Ro and Chris are joined by Timmy and Mabel, a homeless couple living under a bridge in Haverhill, Massachusetts. Learn everything you ever wanted to know about homeless people like where they eat, sleep, defecate, and fornicate. BE WARNED... this episode is cruder than most. Intro "King of the Road" by Roger Miller. Outro "Fancy" by The Geraldine Fibbers.

ZZZlist Radio Special - Interview with Joe Guse, Psychologist and Author http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZCastSpecial_JoeGuse_111509.mp3 http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZCastSpecial_JoeGuse_111509.mp3 In this ZZZlist Radio Special, Ro and Chris interview in Joe Guse, a psychologist and author. Joe has written many books, including "Forever 27- A Psychological Profile of Kurt Cobain, Jimi Hendrix, Janis Joplin, and Jim Morrison", "The Tragic Clowns: An Analysis of the Short Lives of John Belushi, Lenny Bruce, and Chris Farley", and "Barack, Lance, Oprah, and Rudy- Exploring Joseph Campbell's Hero's Journey in Contemporary American Society". Intro "Would You Want Your Sister to Marry One Of Them?" by Lenny Bruce. Outro "Trouble in Mind" by Janis Joplin.

ZZZlist Radio Special - Interview with Roy Heisler, Cinematographer with The Mountain Gorilla Veterinary Project http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZCastSpecial_RoyHeisler_102009.mp3 http://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/www.zzzlist.com/Podcast/Podcasts/ZZZCastSpecial_RoyHeisler_102009.mp3 In this ZZZlist Radio Special, Ro and Chris interview in Roy Heisler, a Cinematographer with The Mountain Gorilla Veterinary Project (MGVP) in East Africa. The MGVP is a team of veterinarians who travel throughout the high mountains of Rwanda, Uganda, and Congo to track and treat the endangered silverback gorillas.
Intro song "Yankadi" by Mamady Keita. Outro "I Wan'na Be Like You (The Monkey Song)" by Louis Prima.
